sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useContext, useEffect } from 'react'; import { ClientContext } from '../../context/clients'; import { AuthContext } from '../../context/auth'; import { GET_CORPORATE_CLIENT } from './queries' import { useQuery } from '@apollo/react-hooks'; import { Segment, Image, Grid, Label, Icon, Container, Header, List } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import moment from 'moment'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function CorporateClientProfile({ props }) { const [corporateClient, setCorporateClient] = useState({}); const [fetched, setFetched] = useState(false); const context = useContext(ClientContext); const userContext = useContext(AuthContext); const clientId = props.computedMatch.params.clientId const { data: corporateData } = useQuery(GET_CORPORATE_CLIENT, { variables: { id: clientId } }) useEffect(() => { if (corporateData) { setCorporateClient(corporateData.corporateClient) if (!fetched) { context.getClient(corporateData.corporateClient) setFetched(true) } } }, [context, fetched, corporateData]) return (
Overview {'>'} CRM {'>'} Client Records {'>'} Client Details Hey there {userContext.user.username}, Here is the Corporate client details
{corporateClient && {corporateClient.name} {corporateClient.status ? "==>" : ''} {corporateClient.email} {corporateClient.phoneNumber} {moment(corporateClient.createdAt).format('ddd, MMM Do YYYY')} {corporateClient.about} {corporateClient.town} {corporateClient.postalAddress || "None provided"} {corporateClient.kraPin} {corporateClient.facebookAccount} {corporateClient.twitterAccount} {corporateClient.instagramAccount} {corporateClient.clientNumber} {corporateClient.contactPersons && {corporateClient.contactPersons.map((contact, key) => ( {contact.name}
 {contact.email} ))} } } ) }
